<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Urchin](/NPCs.aspx?ID=899)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Although their escapades might be notorious, few urchins are thrill-seekers. For some urchins, when begging alone is not enough to fill their bellies, theft becomes a viable survival tactic. Many underworld powers also use urchins as spies and messengers, while training them to become future pickpockets, burglars, and foot soldiers.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Downtrodden_Urchin.png" />
</column>

</row>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +3, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +3, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +7

</column>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 8

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shiv +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d4-1 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4-1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rock +5 ([thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4-1 bludgeoning

**Collaborative Thievery**   The urchin gains a +1 circumstance bonus to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) or [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67) while within 10 feet of an ally who has the pickpocket ability.

**Pickpocket**   The urchin can [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) or [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67) that's closely guarded without taking the usual -5 penalty. They can Steal objects that would be extremely noticeable or time-consuming to remove (like worn shoes, armor, or actively wielded objects).

</column>
